text: Dashamir Tahiri is member of the Parliament of Albania representing the Party for Justice, Integration and Unity (PDIU)."Deputeti Dashamir Tahiri dhuron pagën njëvjeçare dhe një shtëpi për një familje të varfër" Tahiri's father was a nephew of the Albanian patriot Veli Gërra. On 10 December 2012, Tahiri and Shpëtim Idrizi presented to Parliament a resolution in which the PDIU asked Greece for reparations in the amount of 10 billion euros for the expulsion of Cham Albanians."Zbardhet rezoluta çame: Të kthehen pronat 10 miliardë euro" , Gazeta Shqip, 12 December 2012 ==See also== *Politics of Albania ==References== Category:Members of the Parliament of Albania Category:Party for Justice, Integration and Unity politicians Category:Living people Category:21st-century Albanian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Dashamir Tahiri
